member.name: IPublishedApp.GetPublishedAppInfo
member.summary: Gets publishing-related information about an application published by an application publisher.
member.param: A pointer to an structure that returns the application information.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPublishedApp.Install
member.summary: Installs an application published by an application publisher. This method is invoked when the user selects Add or Add Later in Add/Remove Programs in Control Panel.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that specifies the time the user elected to schedule installation through the Add Later button in Add/Remove Programs. This option is only available if the application supports scheduled installation (compare ). If this parameter is NULL, the application should be installed immediately.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPublishedApp.Unschedule
member.summary: Cancels the installation of an application published by an application publisher.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IPublishedApp
member.summary: Exposes methods that represent applications to Add/Remove Programs in Control Panel.
